eternal:AllPreserver.DESCRIPTION: Retain up to !M! card(s). || [MI]: Retain them permanently, then Exhaust.
eternal:AllPreserver.NAME: All-Preserver

eternal:BalefulOmen.DESCRIPTION: ALL enemies gain !M! [Vulnerable] and [Weak]. || Mismatch: Affects you as well.
eternal:BalefulOmen.NAME: Baleful Omen

eternal:Centering.DESCRIPTION: Set ALL of the Next <W> to <S>. Gain !M! [Block] per Next <W> that was not <S>.
eternal:Centering.NAME: Centering

eternal:ChargeAccumulation.DESCRIPTION: At the start of turn: [Electrified] gains +!M!% effect bonus.
eternal:ChargeAccumulation.NAME: Charge Accumulation

eternal:DesperateSacrifice.DESCRIPTION: Lose !S! HP. Gain [E] and !M! Resolve. || <LIM>. If you would die: Survive with 1 HP and <DRW-S>.
eternal:DesperateSacrifice.NAME: Desperate Sacrifice

eternal:Dominate.DESCRIPTION: Deal +!M! damage per Resolve. || [MI]: Deals +25% damage.
eternal:Dominate.NAME: Dominate

eternal:DreamEater.DESCRIPTION: Remove ALL the target's Common Debuffs. Steal !M! HP for each.
eternal:DreamEater.NAME: Psycho Storm

eternal:Erosion.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you make a Mismatch with this in hand: This gains +!M! damage.
eternal:Erosion.NAME: Erosion

eternal:EternalForm.DESCRIPTION: If you would die while having maximum Resolve: Lose ALL Resolve and revert your HP to the value it was at the start of the previous turn.
eternal:EternalForm.NAME: Eternal Form

eternal:EverlastingRetribution.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! [Support Damage]. Trigger it whenever you make a Mismatch.
eternal:EverlastingRetribution.NAME: Everlasting Retribution

eternal:ForcedComposure.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Resolve. || You cannot gain Resolve for !S! turn(s).
eternal:ForcedComposure.NAME: Forced Composure

eternal:FutureSight.DESCRIPTION: Scry !M!. If you discard a {Hindrance}: Gain [Energized].
eternal:FutureSight.NAME: Future Sight

eternal:GreatExpectations.DESCRIPTION: This combat: Resolve gains from Matches and Resolve losses from Mismatches are increased by !M!.
eternal:GreatExpectations.NAME: Great Expectations

eternal:HastyJudgment.DESCRIPTION: ALL Next <W> are changed to <L> or <D>. || [MI]: Lose [E] to <DRW>.
eternal:HastyJudgment.NAME: Hasty Judgment

eternal:ImperialOrder.DESCRIPTION: If the top card of your pile is an Eternal card: Play it. || <SLM>. If it wasn't: <CYC>.
eternal:ImperialOrder.NAME: Imperial Order

eternal:IncantationOfMadness.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play an Attack: Lose !M! Resolve to increase its damage by !S!%. If you had no Resolve: Take !M! damage.
eternal:IncantationOfMadness.NAME: Incantation of Madness

eternal:Indignation.DESCRIPTION: Add !M! {Spite} to your draw pile. || Match: Add them to your hand instead.
eternal:Indignation.NAME: Indignation

eternal:LordOfTheFiles.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you Mismatch: Steal !M! [THP] from a random enemy. || Whenever you Match: Take !S! damage.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you #yMismatch: Steal #b{0} [THP] from a random enemy. NL Whenever you #yMatch: Take #b{1} damage.
eternal:LordOfTheFiles.NAME: Lord of the Files

eternal:MemoriesOfJoy.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! [Block] per <L> card Exhausted this combat.
eternal:MemoriesOfJoy.NAME: Memories of Joy

eternal:MindSplitter.DESCRIPTION: Duplicate the enemy. It has half its HP and has half its attack power
eternal:MindSplitter.NAME: Seclusion

eternal:MoonlightChaser.DESCRIPTION: Fetch a <D> card from your draw pile. || Mismatch: Set the Current <W> to <D>.
eternal:MoonlightChaser.NAME: Moonlight Chaser

eternal:MoralAmbiguity.DESCRIPTION: <D> cards have +!M!% damage and [Block], reduced by !S!% per Resolve. || <L> cards have -!M!% damage and [Block], increased by !S!% per Resolve.
eternal:MoralAmbiguity.NAME: Moral Ambiguity

eternal:NegativeStreak.DESCRIPTION: Set the Next !M! <W> to <D>. ** <slm>. Match: Refund [E] and put a copy of this on top of your draw pile.
eternal:NegativeStreak.NAME: Negative Streak

eternal:OminousInscription.DESCRIPTION: Take !M! damage. ** Whenever the target receives damage: Gain !S! Resolve. || [MI]: Do not take damage.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Whenever this creature receives damage: Gain #b{0} #yResolve.
eternal:OminousInscription.NAME: Ominous Inscription

eternal:Omniscience.DESCRIPTION: Increase the number of Next <W> that you can see by !M! (Max. 8).
eternal:Omniscience.NAME: Omniscience

eternal:OpportuneGift.DESCRIPTION: <ST>: Gain !M! Resolve. || <SLM>. Match: Fetch a random card from your discard pile.
eternal:OpportuneGift.NAME: Opportune Gift

eternal:Origin.DESCRIPTION: Your next Mismatch this turn will not lower Resolve. || Match: Gain !M! Resolve.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: The next #b{0} #yMismatches will not lower #yResolve. Reduced by #b1 each turn.
eternal:Origin.NAME: Origin

eternal:ParalysisWave.DESCRIPTION: At the start of turn: Each enemy has a !M!% chance to get Stunned per stack of [Electrified]. When an enemy is Stunned: It loses [Electrified].
eternal:ParalysisWave.NAME: Paralysis Wave

eternal:PhantomSlash.DESCRIPTION: [MI]: Deal +!M! damage. || <SLM>. On Discard or Exhaust: <DRW>.
eternal:PhantomSlash.NAME: Phantom Slash

eternal:PlaneOfEuthymia.DESCRIPTION: Channel 1 [~Dark]. || Whenever you make a Match: Trigger your first Orb. Whenever you shuffle your deck: Channel !M! [~Dark].
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you make a #yMatch: Trigger your first Orb. NL Whenever you shuffle your deck: Channel #b{0} [~Dark].
eternal:PlaneOfEuthymia.NAME: Plane Of Euthymia

eternal:PledgeOfPropriety.DESCRIPTION: Next turn: Gain !M! [Block] per Resolve (!X!). || You may Exhaust a card to Gain +!S! [Block] next turn.
eternal:PledgeOfPropriety.NAME: Pledge of Propriety

eternal:PolaritySwitch.DESCRIPTION: ALL <L> cards become <D>. ALL <D> cards become <L>. || [MI]: Gain !M! [Support Damage].
eternal:PolaritySwitch.NAME: Polarity Switch

eternal:PositiveStreak.DESCRIPTION: Set the Next !M! <W> to <L>. ** <slm>. Match: Refund [E] and put a copy of this on top of your draw pile.
eternal:PositiveStreak.NAME: Positive Streak

eternal:PrayerOfTheMantis.DESCRIPTION: Next turn: <D> Attacks deal double damage. || [MI]. Takes effect this turn instead.
eternal:PrayerOfTheMantis.NAME: Prayer Of The Mantis

eternal:PrimordialEcho.DESCRIPTION: Obtain a copy of the first card played this combat. It costs 0 this turn. || <LIM>. [MI]: It costs 0 this combat.
eternal:PrimordialEcho.NAME: Primordial Echo

eternal:PsychicVoltage.DESCRIPTION: [Electrified] gains +!M!% effect bonus per unique debuff on any enemy (!X!).
eternal:PsychicVoltage.NAME: Psychic Voltage

eternal:PsychoStorm.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! [Electrified] to ALL enemies. || [Electrified]'s effect bonus increases the damage of this attack.
eternal:PsychoStorm.NAME: Psycho Storm

eternal:Reversal.DESCRIPTION: Return ALL enemies to the lowest HP they had this battle before dealing damage.
eternal:Reversal.NAME: Reversal

eternal:RitesOfPassing.DESCRIPTION: Gain !S! Resolve. Gain +!S! per card Exhausted this turn. || <LIM>. Match. [MI]: Play any Exhausted card.
eternal:RitesOfPassing.NAME: Rites Of Passing

eternal:RoarOfTime.DESCRIPTION: Scry !M!. Next turn, the target loses !S! HP per Attack discarded. || [MI]. Scry 1 more.
eternal:RoarOfTime.NAME: Roar Of Time

eternal:RoyalDecree.DESCRIPTION: Fetch a card from your discard pile. Set its <W> to <L> or <D>. || <ST>. Also Retain it.
eternal:RoyalDecree.NAME: Royal Decree

eternal:Seclusion.DESCRIPTION: Gives !M! less [Block] per Resolve. || [MI]: Gain !S! [Blur] and Exhaust.
eternal:Seclusion.NAME: Seclusion

eternal:ShadowPuppet.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you attack an enemy: Deal additional damage to it equal to the number of <D> cards in hand.
eternal:ShadowPuppet.NAME: Shadow Puppet

eternal:Soulpiercer.DESCRIPTION: If Fatal: Gain !M! Resolve. || Mismatch: Lose !M! Resolve to give this +!S! damage.
eternal:Soulpiercer.NAME: Soulpiercer

eternal:SpacialRend.DESCRIPTION: Deal +!M! damage per card played this turn. || <slm>. Match. <DRW>.
eternal:SpacialRend.NAME: Spacial Rend

eternal:Static.DESCRIPTION: For !M! turns: Your Attacks apply !S! [Electrified] to the target.
eternal:Static.NAME: Static

eternal:Steelbreaker.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! [Vulnerable]. || Match: Remove the target's [Block]. If it had none: Apply +!S! [Vulnerable].
eternal:Steelbreaker.NAME: Steelbreaker

eternal:StormHarvesting.DESCRIPTION: Remove !M! [Electrified] on the target to gain [Energized] and !S! Resolve.
eternal:StormHarvesting.NAME: Storm Harvesting

eternal:TranscendenceForm.DESCRIPTION: Choose 1: Gain !M! [Ritual], !S! [~Intangible], or !X! [Artifact]. || <LIM>. Not in [MI]: Choose 1 more.
eternal:TranscendenceForm.NAME: Transcendence Form

eternal:TransgressiveExorcism.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust up to !M! cards in hand or discard pile. For each: <DRW> next turn and take !S! damage.
eternal:TransgressiveExorcism.NAME: Transgressive Exorcism

eternal:UnchangingEternity.DESCRIPTION: ALL enemies deal !M! less damage per <L> card in hand at the end of turn.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Enemies deal #b{0} less damage per [A-Light] card in hand at the end of turn.
eternal:UnchangingEternity.NAME: Unchanging Eternity

eternal:UndyingAmbition.DESCRIPTION: Purge ALL cards in your discard pile. Deal +!S! damage per card Purged. || [MI]: Gain [Energized] for every enemy killed.
eternal:UndyingAmbition.NAME: Undying Ambition

eternal:UnfulfilledDesires.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! [Vulnerable] to ALL enemies. || Lose ALL Resolve. [Vulnerable] gains +!S!% effect bonus per Resolve lost.
eternal:UnfulfilledDesires.NAME: Unfulfilled Desires

eternal:UnshakableWill.DESCRIPTION: Whenever a debuff is applied to you: Lose !M! Resolve to reduce its stacks by !S!.
eternal:UnshakableWill.NAME: Unshakable Will

eternal:ViciousLunge.DESCRIPTION: Mismatch: Take !M! damage. || [MI]: Damage dealt and taken from this is increased by +!S!%.
eternal:ViciousLunge.NAME: Vicious Lunge

eternal:WideLeap.DESCRIPTION: Discard !S! to Draw !M! next turn. || [MI]. The discarded cards cost 0 until played.
eternal:WideLeap.NAME: Wide Leap

eternal:Willbreaker.DESCRIPTION: Lose !M! Resolve to make the target lose !S! [Strength]. || <LIM>. [MI]: Steal that [Strength].
eternal:Willbreaker.NAME: Willbreaker

eternal:WishesUnnumbered.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you make a Match with this card in hand: Increase this card's [THP] by !S!.
eternal:WishesUnnumbered.NAME: Wishes Unnumbered

eternal:Charm.DESCRIPTION: The target's next Attack this turn gives you [THP] instead of damaging you.
eternal:Charm.NAME: Charm

eternal:Curse_Spite.DESCRIPTION: At the end of turn: ** Take !S! damage. || On Discard, Exhaust, or Purge: ALL enemies lose !M! [HP].
eternal:Curse_Spite.NAME: Spite

eternal:VisionHuntDecree.DESCRIPTION: ALL characters gain !M! [Blinded]. || When a character with [Blinded] targets another character, they have a 50% chance to target another random character.
eternal:VisionHuntDecree.NAME: Vision Hunt Decree
